statements: SELECT * FROM fitness_classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_date FROM fitness_classes;
SELECT class_name, max_capacity FROM fitness_classes WHERE current_capacity < max_capacity;
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(*) AS class_count FROM fitness_classes GROUP BY instructor_name ORDER BY class_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, max_capacity FROM fitness_classes WHERE max_capacity > 20 ORDER BY class_date ASC;
SELECT class_name, current_capacity FROM fitness_classes WHERE current_capacity < max_capacity AND instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name, COUNT(class_id) AS total_classes FROM fitness_classes GROUP BY instructor_name HAVING total_classes > 2;
SELECT class_id, instructor_name, DATE_FORMAT(class_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM fitness_classes WHERE instructor_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM FitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM FitnessClasses WHERE max_capacity > 10;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM FitnessClasses ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM FitnessClasses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, max_capacity FROM FitnessClasses WHERE max_capacity BETWEEN 15 and 20;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM FitnessClasses WHERE max_capacity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Waitlist ORDER BY class_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, contact_number FROM Waitlist WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, max_capacity FROM FitnessClasses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, max_capacity FROM FitnessClasses WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM FitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_capacity FROM FitnessClasses WHERE class_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_capacity FROM FitnessClasses WHERE class_capacity > 20;
SELECT customer_id, waitlist_position FROM Waitlist WHERE class_id = 3 ORDER BY waitlist_position ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_capacity, class_date FROM FitnessClasses WHERE class_capacity > 10 ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_date FROM FitnessClasses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' AND class_capacity < 20 ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, registration_date FROM Customers WHERE registration_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Waitlist WHERE class_id = 1) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_date FROM FitnessClasses WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY class_date ASC, instructor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, start_time, end_time FROM FitnessClasses WHERE max_capacity > 15;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY joined_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, hire_date FROM Instructors WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, start_time, end_time FROM FitnessClasses WHERE max_capacity < 10 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM FitnessClasses WHERE max_capacity > 20;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, start_time, end_time FROM FitnessClasses WHERE start_time < '12:00';
SELECT Customers.full_name, Customers.email, FitnessClasses.class_name FROM Customers JOIN FitnessClasses ON Customers.customer_id = FitnessClasses.class_id;

SELECT Instructors.full_name AS instructor, COUNT(FitnessClasses.class_id) AS class_count FROM Instructors JOIN FitnessClasses ON Instructors.instructor_id = FitnessClasses.class_id GROUP BY Instructors.full_name;

SELECT Customers.full_name, Customers.email, FitnessClasses.class_name, Waitlist.waitlist_position FROM Customers JOIN Waitlist ON Customers.customer_id = Waitlist.customer_id JOIN FitnessClasses ON Waitlist.class_id = FitnessClasses.class_id WHERE Waitlist.waitlist_position < 5;
SELECT * FROM member;
SELECT class_name, instructor FROM fitness_class;
SELECT class_name, class_capacity FROM fitness_class WHERE class_capacity > 20;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM member WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM registration ORDER BY registered_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM fitness_class ORDER BY class_name ASC, class_capacity DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_capacity FROM fitness_class WHERE class_capacity > 20;

SELECT member.first_name, member.last_name, fitness_class.class_name FROM member INNER JOIN registration ON member.member_id = registration.member_id INNER JOIN fitness_class ON registration.class_id = fitness_class.class_id ORDER BY member.last_name ASC;

SELECT fitness_class.class_name, COUNT(attendance.attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM fitness_class LEFT JOIN attendance ON fitness_class.class_id = attendance.class_id GROUP BY fitness_class.class_name;

SELECT member.first_name, member.last_name, COUNT(registration.registration_id) AS total_registrations FROM member LEFT JOIN registration ON member.member_id = registration.member_id GROUP BY member.first_name, member.last_name HAVING total_registrations > 3;
